title: You're Going to Make a Lot of Pizza With the TMNT Cookbook
text:
image credit: Insight Editions / iStock Like us on Facebook 
As everyone knows, the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles love pizza. After all, there's no better way to follow up a hard day of fighting crime than having a few slices of 'za with the gang in the sewer. Eating that much cheese and dough comes with a deep wisdom of what makes a good pie, and the reptilian heroes are now passing that knowledge on with The Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles Pizza Cookbook . Leonardo, Raphael, Donatello, and Michelangelo all weigh in on their favorite toppings, from classic New York pepperoni to deep dish goulash pizza. 
The hardcover book comes with 65 radical recipesâ€”and yes, they're all pizza-related. The turtles are busy fighting crimes, so the cookbook was written by Peggy Paul Casella from ThursdayNightPizza.com . 
You can pre-order this righteous tome on Amazon , which is set to come out in May. March 21, 2017 - 06:30am Rebecca OConnell Rebecca O'Connell is an assistant editor for mentalfloss.com. She spends her free time prowling flea markets, making increasingly elaborate grilled cheeses, and watching 90s cult television. She lives in Brooklyn with two roommates and a dog with more sass than fur. POPULAR ON mental_floss
